pageTitle: Patagonia Women's Kupala Bikini Top | Paradise Fish Swim: Turkish Red
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {54538=Measurements refer to body size, not garment dimensions. * Beginning with our Spring 2015 styles, we've improved our women’s fit: There’s a slight increase at the waist for shaping and to ensure the fit is truer to size. All other measurements, such as chest and hip, remain the same. Please refer to our new, updated Women's Size Chart for details. Note: this change applies to full-price Spring 2015 styles, not to past-season or on-sale items.}
